mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.EDU_ANSWER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.EDU_ANSWER (ANSWER_FLOW, QUESTION_FLOW, ANSWER_USER_FLOW, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, ANS_TYPE_ID, ANS_TYPE_NAME, ANS_DIR, ANS_GRADE) values (#{answerFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
